import "./Post.scss"; import MoreVertIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreVert"; import { Users } from "../../DummyData.js"; function Post({ post }) { const user = Users.filter((u) => u.id === 1); // if user Id = 1 console.log(user); console.log(user[0].username); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0] .profilePicture } alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post?.date} minutes ago
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
